content: this very easy one-skein shawl pattern was designed as part of the design create repeat august blog hop you can check out all 30 of the featured patterns in this blog hop here 1 this lightweight shawl is quick to crochet and the perfect summer accessory the full written pattern is available for free on my blog if you prefer an ad-free pdf copy you can purchase one from my shop here on ravelry the ad-free version includes a stitch diagram for the shawl i hope you enjoy crocheting this project if you have questions please message me and i d be happy to help xo rhondda 1 https //joyofmotioncrochet com/one-skein-wonder-blog-hop-31-free-pdf-crochet-patterns/
